title: buttiya kaTTO
sahitya:
buttiya kaTTO manuja buttiya kattO buttiyannu kaTTidhare ettalAdaru uNa bahudu


caraNam 1    dharmavemba mDigeyalli nirmala mana gange tumbi summAnaduriya hacci ommAnakyanna bAGi
    caraNam 2    arivu emba arive hAsi harivihAla mosara taLidu parama vairAgyadindale shrI harige arpitavendu
    caraNam 3    kartu [urandara viTTala tatvavemba buttiyanu hattira tandiTTu koNDu nitya uNDu trpti paDiro
